metadata.name: Repentance Boss Champions CONTINUED
metadata.description:
[h1] This mod requires REPENTOGON to work! [/h1]
The original mod now ported to REPENTOGON for bug fixes and better mod compatibility! Perhaps even more in the future...?
This mod adds [b]36 new champion variants[/b] to the many bosses added in Repentance. These champions seek to emulate the vanilla game - keeping the bosses similar, but changing, removing, or adding just enough to make the fight a unique experience.
[h1]Credits[/h1] [b]jubbalub - main developer & designer kittenchilly - continued the mod, ported to REPENTOGON Amy - helped with port, contributed champion designs sipher_nil - provided custom art for Bumbino and Purple Siren champions Sin - helped with Fiend Folio Reheated compatibility Warhamm2000, retro100, Moonshine, sipher_nil - contributed champion designs[/b]
